channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ネットフリックスの映画委員長スコット・ステューバーが制作会社設立のため退社を計画、後任が見つかるまでネットフリックスのチーフ・コンテンツ・オフィサーが映画を監督する（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Netflix film chairman Scott Stuber plans to leave to start a production company; Netflix's Chief Content Officer will oversee films until a replacement is found  —  - Executive built streaming service's film studio as chairman … Stuber will stay on as global film chairman at least until …

item.title: 情報筋：人気YouTuberのMrBeastが、アマゾンのプライム・ビデオとリアリティ・コンペティション番組の契約を間近に控えている。
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Sources: popular YouTuber MrBeast is nearing a deal for a reality-competition show with Amazon's Prime Video; the deal is reportedly worth around $100M  —  MrBeast, the massively popular YouTube creator known for big-money giveaways and outlandish stunts, is nearing a deal for a reality-competition show …

item.title: メモNetflixやDisney+などとの配信契約の実現に貢献したベライゾンのチーフ・コンテンツ・オフィサー、エリン・マクファーソンが2月末で退社（Sahil Patel/The Information）
item.description:
Sahil Patel / The Information:
Memo: Verizon chief content officer Erin McPherson, who helped make distribution deals with Netflix, Disney+, and others, is leaving at the end of February  —  Erin McPherson, senior vice president and chief content officer at Verizon who spearheaded the telecom giant's content and distribution deals …

item.title: ロサンゼルス・タイムズのサラ・ヤシンとシャニ・O・ヒルトン編集長は、ケビン・メリダ編集長の辞任から2週間足らずで退社した（Ted Johnson/Deadline）
item.description:
Ted Johnson / Deadline:
Los Angeles Times managing editors Sara Yasin and Shani O. Hilton have exited less than two weeks after executive editor Kevin Merida resigned from the paper  —  UPDATED, 11:42 AM: Two more top editors have resigned from the Los Angeles Times ahead of a new round of planned layoffs.

item.title: アップル、Spatial Audioバージョンが利用可能な楽曲のApple Music使用料を1月分より1再生あたり最大10％増額（Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac）
item.description:
Benjamin Mayo / 9to5Mac:
Apple will pay up to 10% more per play in Apple Music royalties for tracks where a Spatial Audio version is available, starting with January's payouts  —  Apple Music is now encouraging artists with a financial incentive to make their music available in Spatial Audio, which offers …

item.title: Charter Spectrumは、TelevisaUnivisionのViX Premiumを同社のTVパッケージにバンドルする。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / Hollywood Reporter:
Charter Spectrum will bundle TelevisaUnivision's ViX Premium with Ads service in its TV packages, as it seeks new bundles of linear TV offerings with streaming  —  The deal follows Spectrum's landmark deal with Disney last year that bundled Disney+ with its pay-TV package.

item.title: ロサンゼルス・タイムズ紙のサラ・ヤシン編集長が辞職したことを、彼女は同僚にメールで伝えた。
item.description:
Katie Robertson / @katie_robertson:
Los Angeles Times managing editor Sara Yasin has quit, she told colleagues in an email today — she's the second top editor to leave in the wake of exec editor Kevin Merida's exit (h/t @maxwelltani for first reporting the news) [image]

item.title: 検閲問題でYouTubeから "Surviving Barstool "シリーズを撤退させてから約2ヶ月後、Barstool SportsがRumbleとの契約を発表、RUMは30％以上上昇（Ben Axelrod/Awful Announcing）
item.description:
Ben Axelrod / Awful Announcing:
Nearly two months after pulling its Surviving Barstool series from YouTube over censorship claims, Barstool Sports announces a deal with Rumble; RUM jumps 30%+  —  Nearly two months after pulling its popular Surviving Barstool series from YouTube over claims of censorship, Barstool Sports has a new video home.

item.title: フォックス社の広告営業責任者マリアンヌ・ガンベリが退任予定、現在フォックス・ニュースの広告営業責任者ジェフ・コリンズがフォックス社全部門を統括する（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Fox Corp. head of ad sales Marianne Gambelli plans to retire; Jeff Collins, currently head of ad sales for Fox News, will gain oversight of all Fox divisions  —  Collins, currently head of ad sales for Fox News, will add oversight of the entire company's portfolio.

item.title: 2024年の共和党予備選は視聴率低下でニュース視聴者を呼び戻せず、メディア幹部は広告予算を節約するための "トランプ・バンプ "の欠如を反省している（マックス・タニ/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
The 2024 GOP primary races are failing to lure news audiences back, with ratings down, as media execs reckon with the lack of a “Trump bump” to save ad budgets  —  The News  —  For one week every four years, the DoubleTree hotel in downtown Manchester, New Hampshire …

item.title: AIツールを使って合成音声を作成・編集するElevenLabsが、a16z、Nat Friedman、Daniel Grossが共同リードする8000万ドルのシリーズBを10億ドル以上の評価額で調達（Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Kyle Wiggers / TechCrunch:
ElevenLabs, which uses AI tools to create and edit synthetic voices, raised an $80M Series B co-led by a16z, Nat Friedman, and Daniel Gross at a $1B+ valuation  —  There's a lot of money in voice cloning.  —  Case in point: ElevenLabs, a startup developing AI-powered tools to create …

item.title: Sky UK & Irelandのトップであるスティーブン・ヴァン・ローエンは2月末に退任する予定であり、同部門は今後、スカイ・グループCEOのダナ・ストロングに直属する（Georg Szalai/Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / Hollywood Reporter:
Sky UK & Ireland head Stephen van Rooyen plans to step down at the end of February; the unit will now report directly to Sky Group CEO Dana Strong  —  “I have taken the decision that now is the right time for me to leave Sky.”  —  Comcast's Sky Group said on Monday that Stephen van Rooyen …

item.title: オーストラリアのナイン紙が、元デイリー・メール・オーストラリア編集長のルーク・マキルヴィーンをエグゼクティブ・エディターに指名し、エイジ紙、シドニー・モーニング・ヘラルド紙などを統括する（デイジー・デュマ／The Guardian紙）
item.description:
Daisy Dumas / The Guardian:
Australia's Nine newspapers names former Daily Mail Australia editor Luke McIlveen as executive editor, overseeing the Age, the Sydney Morning Herald, and more  —  McIlveen was previously editor-in-chief of news.com.au and founding editor of Daily Mail Australia.  He takes on Tory Maguire's former role at the Age and SMH

item.title: 元『スポーツ・イラストレイテッド』誌のシニア・コラムニスト、ジョー・ポズナンスキーが、同誌が自身の人生とインターネット以前のスポーツ・ジャーナリズムに与えた影響を振り返る（Joe Posnanski/JoeBlogs）
item.description:
Joe Posnanski / JoeBlogs:
Joe Posnanski, a former Sports Illustrated senior columnist, reflects on the magazine's impact on his own life and on sports journalism before the internet  —  At the moment, there's confusion.  Heartbreak and confusion.  Sports Illustrated may live on.  It may not.  It may morph into something else.

item.title: 英国は2027年12月31日に終了するBBCの王室憲章の中間レビューを発表、「BBCは適応する必要があり、さもなければ視聴者の信頼を失う危険がある」と述べた（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
The UK publishes its mid-term review of the BBC's Royal Charter, ending on December 31, 2027, saying “the BBC needs to adapt or risk losing” audience trust  —  The U.K. government is giving more power to the BBC and media regulator Ofcom to handle complaints as part of its mid-term review into the corporation's functioning.
